summary.para: Parameters for use with the FXECHO XAPOFX.

remarks.para: Echo only supports FLOAT32 audio formats.
Windows 10 (XAudio2.9); Windows 8, Windows Phone 8 (XAudio 2.8); DirectX SDK (XAudio 2.7)

summary.para: Ratio of wet (processed) signal to dry (original) signal.
Amount of output to feed back into input.
Delay to all channels in milliseconds. This value must be between FXECHO_MIN_DELAY and .MaxDelay.
